title: Waveform Metadata Json Schema
description: This schema represents Waveform Metadata characterising traces with their QC

wfmetadata_id.description: Unique identifier of the metadata document. This can be a DOI, a Handle or any other type of PID

producer.description: The producer of this document. For instance it can be: a software, a person or an organization

waveform_type.description: Describes the type of waveform. E.g.: seismic, infrasound

waveform_format.description: Describes the waveform format. E.g.: miniSEED

version.description: The version of the metadata document. E.g.: 1.0.0

start_time.description: Start time of the window used for metric computation for this entry in UTC

end_time.description: End time of the window used for metric computation for this entry in UTC

quality.description: SEED quality indicator. This is SEED format specific

encoding.description: Array of unique encodings. E.g.in SEED: int32, int64, float32, float64, opaque (for log channels).

num_records.description: Number of records. This is SEED format specific

record_length.description: Array of unique record lengths. This is SEED format specific

max_gap.description: Duration of the largest gap in seconds

max_overlap.description: Duration of the largest overlap in seconds

sum_gaps.description: Total duration of gaps in seconds

sum_overlaps.description: Total duration of overlaps in seconds

sample_lower_quartile.description: Lower quartile of the sample values

sample_upper_quartile.description: Upper quartile of the sample values

sample_stdev.description: Standard deviation of the sample values

timing_correction.description: Percentage of data for which field 16 in the record header is non-zero

timing_quality_mean.description: Mean of the timing quality percentage values stored in mSEED blockettes 1001

timing_quality_min.description: Minimum of the timing quality percentage values stored in mSEED blockettes 1001

timing_quality_max.description: Maximum of the timing quality percentage values stored in mSEED blockettes 1001

timing_quality_median.description: The 50th percentile of all timing quality percentage values stored in mSEED blockettes 1001

timing_quality_lower_quartile.description: The 25th percentile of all timing quality percentage values stored in mSEED blockettes 1001

timing_quality_upper_quartile.description: The 75th percentile of all timing quality percentage values stored in mSEED blockettes 1001

amplifier_saturation.description: Percentage of data for which bit 0 in the DQ flag is set to 1

digitizer_clipping.description: Percentage of data for which bit 1 in the DQ flag is set to 1

spikes.description: Percentage of data for which bit 2 in the DQ flag is set to 1

glitches.description: Percentage of data for which bit 3 in the DQ flag is set to 1

missing_padded_data.description: Percentage of data for which bit 4 in the DQ flag is set to 1

telemetry_sync_error.description: Percentage of data for which bit 5 in the DQ flag is set to 1

digital_filter_charging.description: Percentage of data for which bit 6 in the DQ flag is set to 1

suspect_time_tag.description: Percentage of data for which bit 7 in the DQ flag is set to 1

calibration_signal.description: Percentage of data for which bit 0 in the Activity flag is set to 1

time_correction_applied.description: Percentage of data for which bit 1 in the Activity flag is set to 1

event_begin.description: Percentage of data for which bit 2 in the Activity flag is set to 1

event_end.description: Percentage of data for which bit 3 in the Activity flag is set to 1

positive_leap.description: Percentage of data for which bit 4 in the Activity flag is set to 1

negative_leap.description: Percentage of data for which bit 5 in the Activity flag is set to 1

event_in_progress.description: Percentage of records for which bit 6 in the Activity flag is set to 1

station_volume.description: Percentage of records for which bit 0 in the I/O and Clock flag is set to 1

long_record_read.description: Percentage of records for which bit 1 in the I/O and Clock flag is set to 1

short_record_read.description: Percentage of records for which bit 2 in the I/O and Clock flag is set to 1

start_time_series.description: Percentage of records for which bit 3 in the I/O and Clock flag is set to 1

end_time_series.description: Percentage of records for which bit 4 in the I/O and Clock flag is set to 1

clock_locked.description: Percentage of records for which bit 5 in the I/O & Clock flag is set to 1

c_segments.description: Continuous segments within the requested time interval

sample_rate.description: Sample rate in the continuous segment

sample_min.description: Minimum of samples in a continuous segment

sample_max.description: Maximum of samples in a continuous segment

sample_mean.description: Mean of the sample values in a continuous segment

sample_rms.description: Rms of the sample values in a continuous segment

sample_lower_quartile.description: Lower quartile of the sample values in a continuous segment

sample_upper_quartile.description: Upper quartile of the sample values in a continuous segment

sample_median.description: 50th percentile of the sample values in a continuous segment

start_time.description: Time of the first sample of the segment in UTC

end_time.description: Time of the last sample of the segment in UTC

num_samples.description: Number of data samples in the continuous segment

sample_stdev.description: Standard deviation of samples in the continuous segment

segment_length.description: Length in seconds of the specific continuous segment
